title: Data-Driven Gymnastics Lesson Project Design Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental gymnastics movements and understanding of physical education theory
context.additional_context: Course enhancing gymnastics project design capabilities through combined online platforms and offline practical classes. Integrates learner device usage and data analysis tools

learning_goals: Educational objectives and content classifications for gymnastics class projects can be analyzed based on data
Optimal gymnastics class sequences can be designed using learners' interaction data
Age-specific gymnastics educational content models can be proposed through data analysis based on learner characteristics
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
